description:
When Yachi Haruaki’s dad sends him a mysterious cube from abroad, his life is turned upside-down by its contents – a mysterious being named Fear.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Futon ni Utsuru Mono o Shiranai
I Don`t Know What Moved into My Futon
Não Tenho Idéia De Quem Vai Para A Cama!
布団に移るものを知らない
